articles.title: 'If you're outside the top six, you can never target an FA Cup run'
articles.summary: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis explains why the FA Cup has fallen down the pecking order for managers, despite still being a special competition.

articles.title: Macclesfield's 'massive occasion' tinged with sadness
articles.summary: Non-league Macclesfield host holders Crystal Palace in the FA Cup on Saturday, 25 days after the death of their player Ethan McLeod.

articles.title: Arsenal extend lead at top of table after draw with Liverpool
